properties.name: 2201 Gaebler B Avenue
properties.marketing_message: Welcome home to 2201 Gaebler Avenue in Overland! This charming 2-bedroom, 1-bath home in the desirable Ritenour School District offers a fresh, updated living experience. Featuring 710 square feet of comfortable living space, you'll find everything you need, including central AC, a dishwasher, refrigerator, stove & oven, and convenient laundry hookups. Enjoy the ease of off-street parking and a full, unfinished basement for extra storage. This property is pet-friendly (with applicable fees), making it perfect for the whole family. Located close to shopping and major highways, youâ€™ll have easy access to everything the St. Louis metro area has to offer. Make this your home and enjoy the convenience and comfort of a well-maintained property in a fantastic location!
properties.marketing_amenities: Central AC, Dishwasher, Laundry Hookups, Refrigerator, Stove & Oven, Washer & Dryer Hookups, Window Coverings
properties.marketing_pets_policy: Pets allowed with pet fee and additional pet rent.
properties.utilities_tenant_paid: Electric, Gas, Water, Sewer, Trash, Recycle, Landscaping, Grass Mowing, Snow Removal Services
